name: Text to Audio Transcription
description: This function transcribes audio files to text using the faster-whisper model.
author: Shinkai

configurations.name: model_name
configurations.description: The size of the Whisper model to use

configurations.name: device
configurations.description: The device to run the model on

configurations.name: compute_type
configurations.description: The compute type to use for the model

audio_file_path.description: The path to the audio file to transcribe

transcript.description: The transcribed text from the audio file
